oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of property "taken away or destroyed" by "Rebels" in Morgan County, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This item is part of the documentation from a property dispute adjudicated by the Morgan County Chancery Court between J.W. Keith and Jesse Stinecipher. It is a list of property items "converted, taken away, or destroyed" by Clark and Jesse Stinecipher, Len Bletcher, Orme Davies "or Rebel soldiers & marauders with whom they were allied." The list of items includes corn, hay, honey, bacon, leather, fence rails, pens, and more. The last item is a "Union Flag made of fine silk" valued at $30.00
